title: Candlestick, ca. 1800–20
provenance: Delomosne and Son, Ltd., London; 1966 Phelps Warren NY
description: Ovoid molded ribbed shapft with flat knops above and below, foot spreads insquare molded section to thick square base; straight-sided nozzle with drippan top; ground pontil bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Candlestick, ca. 1800–20.
ca. 1800–20. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-199.
